last_task_title: Comprehensive test failure analysis and fixes with /ultrathink orchestration
last_task_description:
{
  "priority": 5,
  "type": "bug_fix",
  "context": "Test suite reveals critical failures: 28 failed tests, 105 fixture scope errors (pytest-asyncio ScopeMismatch), and 19 binary/SDK integration errors. Use /ultrathink slash command to orchestrate systematic analysis and fixes across the test infrastructure.",
  "business_context": "Test failures block development velocity and risk production deployments. 100% test pass rate is critical for maintaining code quality and developer confidence in the LiteLLM Memory Proxy system.",
  "technical_requirements": [
    "Fix pytest-asyncio fixture scope mismatches (module vs function scope)",
    "Resolve test_binary_vs_sdk.py connection and HTTP 500 errors",
    "Fix test_anthropic_format_compatible backward compatibility test",
    "Maintain 135 passing tests while fixing failures",
    "Document root cause analysis and prevention strategies"
  ],
  "agent_assignments": {
    "tech_lead": "Use /ultrathink to orchestrate Architect, Research, Coder, and Tester agents for comprehensive solution",
    "qa_test_engineer": "Design fixture patterns that prevent scope mismatches, validate all test categories pass",
    "backend_developer": "Fix binary/SDK integration issues, ensure proxy startup reliability"
  },
  "success_criteria": [
    "All 105 fixture scope errors resolved",
    "All 28 failed tests passing",
    "135 previously passing tests remain stable",
    "Test suite completes with 0 errors, 0 failures",
    "./RUN_TESTS.sh all returns exit code 0",
    "Documentation added explaining fixture patterns and test architecture"
  ]
}
